column4: Excuse me, is there any way I can possibly get some help playing Guild Wars on Linux?
I am using the latest version of Wine
But when I go to run the game, it goes to the loading screen, loads 100% than closes, followed by Wine closing
You might get better help in #winehq
What are you trying to look at?
You don't need sudo for that, if you'r at the terminal, make sure you use -a, in nautilus, make sure you show hidden files (ctrl-h)
no.  While in nautilus, hit ctrl-h
and, close the one that's been sudod.
Have you run wine or winecfg yet?
what does (in terminal), `ls -al ~ | grep wine` give you?
That definately shouldn't say no file or directory.
If that says no file or directory, you have bigger issues.
Like ~ is no longer aliased to your home directory
Are you sure `ls -al ~/ | grep wine` gives you no file or directory?
Exactly.  There's your wine directory.  On the same token, you should be able to see it in nautilus
